pma:database.name: Pult
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `dbo_user_application_pc` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `date_of_creation` text NOT NULL, `name_user_creation_app` text NOT NULL, `message` text NOT NULL, `checked_engineer` int(1) NOT NULL, `date_of_completion` text NOT NULL, `name_engineer_completion` text NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=117 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
